thread.title: Scottish Tories confident of becoming main opposition to SNP after by-election gains
thread.title_full: Scottish Tories confident of becoming main opposition to SNP after by-election gains - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Scottish Tories confident of becoming main opposition to SNP after by-election gains
text: The Conservatives are hopeful they can shock the pollsters and usurp Labour as the main opposition party at the Scottish Parliament in Edinburgh next year. A Cabinet source pointed to a series of recent Scottish council by-elections in
